page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN CLAWTON
page.content: The{Red Bus}Company has two services that run through Clawton,the {Mini bus}and the large Red bus. The Mini bus stops at Claw Park two days a Week and takes old age{pensioners}to Holsworthy to do their shopping.The large Red bus stops at{Claw Park}every day of the week but not Thursday.It arrives at{9.20 a.m}and goes to Banstaple.You can get off at {Holsworthy}or{Bideford}if you wish. Children get to school by car or by bus.There are two buses, a Mini bus and a large bus.The mini bus starts at Mount lane at{8.30 a.m.}then it arives at Clawton School at{8.50 a.m. The large school bus goes round {Teccott}and{North Tamerton. It takes the children to Clawton School and to Holsworthy{Secondary}School.
